# intent

**Instance Property**

The intent that performs the action when invoking the shortcut.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var intent: INIntent? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is `nil` when you create the shortcut with an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity] object.
title: intent
